name: Holly Porter
what_you_do: International speaker, entrepreneur, and consultant who helps people and organizations turn adversity into opportunity through speaking, coaching, and community building.
who_you_serve: People and organizations seeking authentic connections, growth, and transformation.
social_proof: 15-time #1 best-selling author, international speaker, more than three decades of experience across industries, host of the All Things Retreat podcast
business_focus: Empowering people and organizations to cultivate authentic connections, embrace possibility, and thrive through speaking, coaching, and community building.
